unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability of Two Bags of Candy Being Overfilled
question_text:
The weights of bags of a popular fruity candy are normally distributed with a mean of $12.14\text{ ounces}$ and standard deviation of $0.22\text{ ounces}$.
If two bags of this candy are selected at random and the weights of the bags are independent, what is the probability that both bags will weigh more than $12.5\text{ ounces}$?
